translations: n.（印巴等的）酋长；将领；权贵

phrs.translation: 将领, 队长, 司令官

sentences.sentence: He says he did not wish to surrender to any one but you, as you are the son of the Sirdar and he respects you much.
sentences.translation: 他说他不希望任何人投降，但你你的儿子和他的将领很尊重你。

sentences.sentence: As a Mohe noble, Li Jinxing was born in a sirdar family, and because of the impact of his family and society, he had received a good education in arts and military when he was young.
sentences.translation: 作为靺鞨贵族的李谨行，出生在将门之家，受其家庭和社会的影响，自幼便接受了良好的教育，文武双修。
